languages.text: Лорд-капитан попытал{mf|ся|ась} выстроить на пути страха плотину из логики и знания о чудовищных наваждениях Хаоса.
The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан попытал{mf|ся|ась} выстроить на пути страха плотину из логики и знания о чудовищных наваждениях Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} intentó crear un baluarte contra el miedo recurriendo a la lógica y a lo que sabía sobre las monstruosas apariciones del Caos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} intentó crear un baluarte contra el miedo recurriendo a la lógica y a lo que sabía sobre las monstruosas apariciones del Caos.

languages.text: 舰长大人试图通过逻辑以及{mf|他|她}对混沌幻象的了解，筑起一道抵抗恐惧的堤坝。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人试图通过逻辑以及{mf|他|她}对混沌幻象的了解，筑起一道抵抗恐惧的堤坝。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは渾沌の巨大な亡霊に関する論理と知識を活用して、恐怖をせき止めるダムを作ろうとした。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは渾沌の巨大な亡霊に関する論理と知識を活用して、恐怖をせき止めるダムを作ろうとした。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain versucht, eine Mauer gegen {mf|seine|ihre} Furcht zu errichten, indem {mf|er|sie} Logik und {mf|seine|ihre} Kenntnisse über die monströsen Erscheinungen des Chaos ausnutzt.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain versucht, eine Mauer gegen dein Furcht zu errichten, indem {mf|er|sie} Logik und {mf|seine|ihre} Kenntnisse über die monströsen Erscheinungen des Chaos ausnutzt.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} essaya d'ériger un mur contre la peur en puisant dans sa logique et ses connaissances des monstrueuses apparitions du Chaos.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} essaya d'ériger un mur contre la peur en puisant dans sa logique et ses connaissances des monstrueuses apparitions du Chaos.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, mantığından ve Kaos'un musibetleri hakkındaki bilgilerinden güç alarak korkuya direnmeye çalıştı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain tried to build a dam against the fear, drawing upon logic and {mf|his|her} knowledge of the monstrous apparitions of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, mantığından ve Kaos'un musibetleri hakkındaki bilgilerinden güç alarak korkuya direnmeye çalıştı.
